UNION
SELECT b.num, b.author, b.wdate, b.title, b.contents, b.hit, b.pnum , t.grpno ,CONCAT(t.path,',',CONCAT(REPEAT('0',(6-CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(b.num AS CHAR(30))))),CAST(b.num AS CHAR(30)))) AS path , t.lvl+1 AS lvl FROM tmp1 t JOIN bbs b ON t.num=b.pnum ) SELECT num, author, wdate, CONCAT(REPEAT('ã…¤', lvl*2),title) 'title', contents, pnum, path, lvl, hit,grpno FROM tmp1 ORDER BY grpno desc, path asc
